summary: THE CONSUMER STATES THAT THE DEFROST IS IN THE AIR CONDITIONER MODE.  THE AIR THAT COMES OUT OF THE VENTS IS COLD AND DOES NOT DEFROST THE WINDOW.  CONSUMER VISION IS OBSTRUCTED, MAY CAUSE AN ACCIDENT.   TS  CONSUMER ADDED THE DEFROSTER AIR IS WARM, BUT COULD BE MORE EFFICIENT IF AIR CONDITIONER COULD BE SHUT OFF WHEN DEFROST MODE IS ON.   *TT
